data.title: Daniel Loeb's Top 5 Trades in the 3rd Quarter
data.text: Daniel Loeb (Trades, Portfolio) has revealed his portfolio for the third quarter. During the quarter, the guru added 20 new holdings, including PG&E Corp. (NYSE:PCG) and Microsoft Corp. (NASDAQ:MSFT).

data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Xbox Series X/S Plagued by Shortages
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) faces supply shortages for the Xbox Series X/S that may last well into 2021, crimping holiday season sales in 2020.

data.title: Microsoft's New Security Chip Could Strengthen Windows
data.text: The software giant is devoting more resources to designing chips, and one of its designs could help protect your next PC.

data.title: Microsoft reveals Pluton, a custom security chip built into Intel, AMD, and Qualcomm processors
data.text: For the past two years, some of the world's biggest chip makers have battled a series of hardware flaws, like Meltdown and Spectre, which made it possible — though not easy — to pluck passwords and other sensitive secrets directly from their processors. The chip makers rolled out patches, but required the companies to rethink […]

data.title: Microsoft announces a new 'once-in-a-generation' security chip called Pluton it says will make laptops much more secure as some workers never return to an office (MSFT)
data.text: Microsoft is announcing a new, security-focused computer chip that it says will make laptops more secure as many corporate workers never plan to return to an office full-time.  On Tuesday the software giant announced the new Pluton Processor, which will be put into Microsoft Windows computer chips by AMD, Intel, and Qualcomm and will ship in devices in the next three years. Pluton takes security processes that were once split between different parts of a laptop and puts them together in the central processing unit, ultimately making the laptop more secure in a time when in-office protection like corporate networks have fading relevance.

data.title: 5 Stocks to Buy as AI Takes Over Daily Life Activities
data.text: AI is becoming an integral part of our daily lives and finds application in day-to-day jobs. This calls for investing in The Trade Desk (TTD), Alphabet (GOOGL), Microsoft (MSFT), NVIDIA (NVDA) and Teradyne (TER).
